definition: occur between other event or between certain points of time
details:
verb
- occur between other event or between certain points of time
= example: occur between other event or between certain points of time
- get involved, so as to alter or hinder an action, or through force or threat of force
= example: get involved, so as to alter or hinder an action, or through force or threat of force
= synonyms: interpose, interfere, step in
- be placed or located between other things or extend between spaces and events
= example: be placed or located between other things or extend between spaces and events
